criteria.search_text: (cochlea OR "basilar papilla" OR "organ of corti" OR "stria vascularis" OR "reissner membrane" OR "spiral ganglion" OR "basilar membrane" OR "vestibular labyrinth" OR "semicircular canal" OR "vestibular macula" OR "otolith" OR "crista ampullaris" OR  "utricle" NOT "prostatic" NOT "pharyngeal")
